mapper.sql: id AS "id", message_id AS "messageId", order_type AS "orderType", task_mg AS "taskMg", goods_type AS "goodsType", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_sku AS "materialSku", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_number AS "mNumber", sorting_info AS "sortingInfo", turnover_type AS "turnoverType", turnover_number AS "turnoverNumber", barcode AS "barcode",turnover_mouth_quality AS "turnoverMouthQuality", req_tag AS "reqTag", req_status AS "reqStatus", res_tag AS "resTag", res_status AS "resStatus", loca_number AS "locaNumber", task_feedback AS "taskFeedback", create_time AS "createTime", req_time AS "reqTime", data_time AS "dataTime",mark AS "mark",spare_field AS "spareField"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_warehouse_task_out where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and message_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.messageId},'%')
and order_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orderType},'%')
and task_mg like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskMg},'%')
and goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and sorting_info like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sortingInfo},'%')
and turnover_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverType},'%')
and turnover_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverNumber},'%')
and barcode like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.barcode},'%')
and req_tag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqTag},'%')
and req_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqStatus},'%')
and res_tag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.resTag},'%')
and res_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.resStatus},'%')
and loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and task_feedback like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskFeedback},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and req_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqTime},'%')
and data_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataTime},'%')

and res_tag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.resTag},'%')

and loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')

select wms_warehouse_task_out.id AS "id", wms_warehouse_task_out.message_id AS "messageId", wms_warehouse_task_out.order_type AS "orderType", wms_warehouse_task_out.task_mg AS "taskMg", wms_warehouse_task_out.goods_type AS "goodsType", wms_warehouse_task_out.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_warehouse_task_out.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_warehouse_task_out.material_type AS "materialType", wms_warehouse_task_out.material_name AS "materialName", wms_warehouse_task_out.m_batch AS "mBatch", wms_warehouse_task_out.m_number AS "mNumber", wms_warehouse_task_out.sorting_info AS "sortingInfo", wms_warehouse_task_out.turnover_type AS "turnoverType", wms_warehouse_task_out.turnover_number AS "turnoverNumber", wms_warehouse_task_out.barcode AS "barcode", wms_warehouse_task_out.turnover_mouth_quality AS "turnoverMouthQuality", wms_warehouse_task_out.req_tag AS "reqTag", wms_warehouse_task_out.req_status AS "reqStatus", wms_warehouse_task_out.res_tag AS "resTag", wms_warehouse_task_out.res_status AS "resStatus", wms_warehouse_task_out.loca_number AS "locaNumber", wms_warehouse_task_out.task_feedback AS "taskFeedback", wms_warehouse_task_out.create_time AS "createTime", wms_warehouse_task_out.req_time AS "reqTime", wms_warehouse_task_out.data_time AS "dataTime", wms_warehouse_task_out.mark AS "mark", wms_warehouse_task_out.spare_field AS "spareField", wms_material_type.sizes as "sizes" from wms_warehouse_task_out LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_warehouse_task_out.material_type_id=wms_material_type.id where 1 = 1
and wms_warehouse_task_out.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.message_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.messageId},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.order_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orderType},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.task_mg like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskMg},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')

and wms_warehouse_task_out.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.sorting_info like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sortingInfo},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.turnover_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverType},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.turnover_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverNumber},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.barcode like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.barcode},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.req_tag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqTag},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.req_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqStatus},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.res_tag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.resTag},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.res_status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.resStatus},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.loca_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.locaNumber},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.task_feedback like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskFeedback},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.req_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.reqTime},'%')
and wms_warehouse_task_out.data_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataTime},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
